name: Pigeon Park
description: Pigeon Park is a P2E game that allows web3 users to turn bird droplets into crypto gold. Dive beakfirst into the feathered chaos with our new game. Embark on a mission to poop on people and cars, racking up points in the most pigeon way possible. Pigeon Park is the place you're free to spread your wings and embrace your inner pigeon. With a P2E game and a robust, community driven token, Pigeon Park is a long term project thatâ€™s here to stay. Join the flock now.
